segments.text: The woman seems so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite mischievous, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous watching the boy balance like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so cute, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the mess before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall if he's not more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees the children soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me feel quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
